name: overdrink
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to drink more alcohol than is good for your health, or so much that you are unable to speak or act in the usual way: They hope that this campaign will help to reduce the number of young people who overdrink. It's harder work for our heart if we over-eat, smoke, over-drink and don't exercise.
More examplesFewer examplesSome drinkers are more likely to overdrink when they are alone.With certain medications, you want to be careful not to overdrink.She never used to overdrink when she was at home with her family.
